itunes:title: Q&A: how to create a workout split, rest days, healthy eating, being consistent & more!
title: Q&A: how to create a workout split, rest days, healthy eating, being consistent & more!
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
itunes:summary:
Sit back and relax as Britt answers your questions! She shares her workout split, tips on how to create one for yourself, how to lift heavier and push yourself in the gym and even some of her favorite go-to recipes!
